channel.title: Java *.java hates me!
channel.description: When i try to run.bat using java *.java it says NoClassDefFoundError: antilag/java then dissappears really fast even when i add pause my paths are as follows [IMG]http://i15.tinypic.com/73e419k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i9.tinypic.com/89v0g91.jpg[/img] and im really dissappointed

item.title: Java *.java hates me!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_One Epic One
item.description:
@Epic_One wrote:

Run.bat

@echo off
Title Running [Servername]
java server
pause

Compile.bat

@echo off
Title Compiling [Servername]
javac *.java
pause

Run Compile.bat First
Then run Run.bat.

Read full topic
